alert.note: Alert for Barceloneta; Ciales; Florida; Manati; Morovis (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 01 at 3:52PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following counties, Barceloneta, Ciales, Florida, Manati and Morovis. * WHEN...Until 445 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 252 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Up to 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Ciales, Florida, Manati, Morovis, Barceloneta, Barahona, Franquez, Pajonal, Coto Norte, La Luisa, Imbery, Bufalo, Tierras Nuevas Poniente, Tierras Nuevas Pon, Tiburones and Garrochales. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
